name: Unwoven
description:
You play as a scarecrow that's connected to a large crystal heart. The world around you is black and white which causes your heart to slowly lose health. You need to forage for crystals that grow on plants in order to power an artifact that makes a ring of color. Once powered, the artifact will start moving. The more you power the artifact,  the faster it will go and larger ring of color it will produce. Be careful not to let your heart or the artifact fall into water. Gameplay is about 5 minutes (if you can beat it on the first try).

Controls

WASD to move.

SPACE to pick up and throw objects.

SHIFT to warp to your heart.

ESC for pause/options

Credits

Coding and Design: Me! (@AboutThatYak)

Player Concept and Animation: Also me!

Additional Art: Michael Shelton (@MichaelGS1217)

Tilesets: Szadi art

Music: Nathan Whitney
